name: Conflagration
description:
Play in procedurally generated levels, fight enemies, avoid traps and find your way to portal.

Levels are configured in Conflagration_Data/levelX.ini files in xml format, feel free to modify and add your own configuration.

Game is in early stage of development and lacks visual features and needs many improvements.

I'm developing this game by myself in my free time, so progress is rather slow.
I would appreciate any suggestions and ideas concerning game.

Control:
WASD / arrows - move
space - jump
LMB - attack
esc - pause menu
